document_data.mainbody:
The Rathgaunt Hills was a rocky outcropping located along the southern edge of the Shaar.
The Rathgaunt Hills were located just east of Lake Lhespen and south of the River Shaar. The Traders Way passed through the hills near their midpoint near the town of Sebben. The hills ran west to east for approximately  before levelling out near the Landrise.
The mage Phelpar had a hidden cache of magic items stored in a cave within the Rathgaunt Hills.
